Name: Guess who ?
About the game: This is a quiz game, you will see 5 image of animals, 1 target and 4 opts, your mission very simple, just select the animal of the same species with the target animals. Game Features : + 60 difference animals with sound + 2 Mode gameplay: Normal and Easy Mod (more time) + Easy to play + Easy achievements + Custom achievements Very Fun! Game for everybody!
